release.notes: D1 Switched from disabling plugin on load of unsupported MC Version to attempt to load newest eventHandlers D2 Console can now use mmh config, tabs auto-fixed, added config_comments.yml guide, config.yml now clean D3 Fixed beheading messages (hex/gradient/rainbow), added 10 new colorful ones, now supports up to 8-color gradients, fixed Zombie Villager Shepherd + biome heads, updated head updater, CoreUtils sync D4 Fixed Vex handler, Fixed Villager.json D5 Fixed Villager and Zombie Villager for Paper. D6 Fixed Cat and Frog heads. D7 Fixed updatechecker message on join, via CoreUtils update. D8 Fixed Copper Golem weatherstate detection. D9 Fixing papers changes to weatherstate. Reset epoch time to 1764860848L. D10 Fixed NPE when Creaking dies without a cause. D11 Added 1.21.11 Mobs D12 Updated translation system, and updated epoch time. D13 Added rest of translations, fixed Config GUI not reloading on close, fixed named weapons being called bare hands. D14 Fixed beheading messages with better json parsing. D15 DLC merged into MMH, -DEV no longer forces debug. D16 Cleaned up DLC code, leaving DLCInstaller for possible future use.

D6 Fixed Cat and Frog heads. D7 Fixed updatechecker message on join, via CoreUtils update. D8 Fixed Copper Golem weatherstate detection. D9 Fixing papers changes to weatherstate. Reset epoch time to 1764860848L. D10 Fixed NPE when Creaking dies without a cause. D11 Added 1.21.11 Mobs D12 Updated translation system, and updated epoch time. D13 Added rest of translations, fixed Config GUI not reloading on close, fixed named weapons being called bare hands. D14 Fixed beheading messages with better json parsing. D15 DLC merged into MMH, -DEV no longer forces debug.
